p: Recombinant vaccinia viruses were generated via homologous recombination, as described by Wang et al. ( 2015). Briefly, CEFs were infected with vaccinia virus Tiantan strain at a multiplicity of infection of 0.01â€“0.1, followed by transfection with recombinant pJSC1175 plasmids containing fusion genes of NP and M2e. Subsequently, recombinant vaccinia viruses were screened by blue-white selection. Viral DNA was isolated from each recombinant vaccinia virus to confirm the presence of fusion genes ( NPM2e, M2eNP, 4M2eNP, and 4M2eNPs) by PCR and sequencing of PCR products. The confirmed recombinant vaccinia viruses were produced on a large scale in CEFs. The control recombinant vaccinia virus RVJ1175 was generated using the same method with the empty pJSC1175 vector.
